name: Tam Coc Escape
description:
Enjoy an escape
to Tam Coc with great combination of staying at an authentic resort and taking
a peaceful boat trip along the river and rice fields between the breathtaking
formations of limestone mountains in Tam Coc, the place called “Halong Bay
inland”. Besides, other visits will include historical ancient capital of Hoa
Lu, Phat Diem Stone Church and Bai Dinh Pagoda. The walk or biking trip from
the resort will be a nice experience in this Vietnam tour also.
